messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Unschooling Resources
messages.msgSnippet: ... You can write to owners and moderators by appending -owner to a group s address. So to write to the owners and moderators of this group you d send an email
messages.messageBody:
on 12/31/03 2:47 AM, Penn Acres at pennacres@... wrote:

> Is the Owner/Moderator of Yahoo Unschooling resources on this group?
> Have you seen the junk that is showing up there?
> grace

You can write to owners and moderators by appending -owner to a group's
address.

So to write to the owners and moderators of this group you'd send an email
to:

UnschoolingDiscussion-owner@yahoogroups.com

so I'm guessing the address would be:

Unschooling-Resources-owner@yahoogroups.com

Joyce

messages.subject: Unschooling Resources
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Folks, I compiled the list you gave me: The Unschooling Handbook  by Mary Griffith The Are of Education by Linda Dobson Learning All the Time by John
messages.messageBody:
Hi Folks,

I compiled the list you gave me:

"The Unschooling Handbook" by Mary Griffith
"The Are of Education" by Linda Dobson
"Learning All the Time" by John Holt
"Child's Work" by Nancy Wallace
"Flow: The Psychology of Optimal Experience"
by Mihaly Eszikshentimihaly
"The Book of Learning and Forgetting" by Frank Smith
"And the Skylark Sings to me"
www.skylarksings.com
"Learning at Home, A Mother's Guide to Homeschooling"
by Marty Layne

Thanks for all the resources everyone. Looks like I'm be going to the
library to look at some books.

Blessings and Success,
Sherry
